Name: SubstanceClassificationGSRSBR

Name: AllLanguages
Title: All Languages
Descriptino: This value set includes all possible codes from BCP-47 (see http://tools.ietf.org/html/bcp47)

Name: CountryValueSet
Title: Country ValueSet
Descriptino: This value set defines a base set of codes for countries.             Note: The codes for countries are taken from    [ISO 3166](https://www.iso.org/iso-3166-country-codes.html).

Name: IdentifierTypeCodes
Title: Identifier Type Codes
Descriptino: A coded type for an identifier that can be used to determine which identifier to use for a specific purpose.

Name: IdentifierUse
Title: IdentifierUse
Descriptino: Identifies the purpose for this identifier, if known .

Name: IngredientManufacturerRole
Title: Ingredient Manufacturer Role
Descriptino: The way in which this manufacturer is associated with the ingredient. For example whether it is a possible one (others allowed), or an exclusive authorized one for this ingredient. Note that this is not the manufacturing process role.

Name: Iso316613
Title: Iso 3166 Part 1: 3 Letter Codes
Descriptino: This value set defines the ISO 3166 Part 1 3-letter codes

Name: JurisdictionValueSet
Title: Jurisdiction ValueSet
Descriptino: This value set defines a base set of codes for country, country subdivision and region    for indicating where a resource is intended to be used.             Note: The codes for countries and country subdivisions are taken from    [ISO 3166](https://www.iso.org/iso-3166-country-codes.html)    while the codes for "supra-national" regions are from    [UN Standard country or area codes for statistical use (M49)](http://unstats.un.org/unsd/methods/m49/m49.htm).

Name: CommonLanguages
Title: Common Languages
Descriptino: This value set includes common codes from BCP-47 (see http://tools.ietf.org/html/bcp47)

Name: OrganizationType
Title: Organization Type
Descriptino: This example value set defines a set of codes that can be used to indicate a type of organization.

Name: ProductIntendedUse
Title: Product Intended Use
Descriptino: The overall intended use of a product.

Name: PublicationStatus
Title: PublicationStatus
Descriptino: The lifecycle status of an artifact.

Name: SubstanceAmountType
Title: Substance Amount Type
Descriptino: The relationship between two substance types.

Name: SNOMEDCTSubstanceCodes
Title: SNOMED CT Substance Codes
Descriptino: This value set includes all substance codes from SNOMED CT - provided as an exemplar value set.

Name: SubstanceForm
Title: Substance Form
Descriptino: The substance form, whether it is the base form or a salt.

Name: SubstanceNameAuthority
Title: Substance Name Authority
Descriptino: An authority that officates substance names.

Name: SubstanceRepresentationFormat
Title: Substance Representation Format
Descriptino: A format of a substance representation.

Name: StructureTechnique
Title: Structure Technique
Descriptino: The method used to elucidate the structure or characterization of the drug substance.

Name: AdditionalMonitoringIndicator
Title: Indicador de Monitorização Adicional
Descriptino: Indicadores de monitorização extra para produtos medicinais

Title: Formas Farmacêuticas Administráveis
Descriptino: Formas farmacêuticas administráveis usando códigos EDQM Standard Terms

Title: Propriedades Administráveis
Descriptino: Tipos de propriedades específicas para produtos administráveis (padrão internacional)

Name: AdministrableUnit
Title: Unidades Administráveis
Descriptino: Unidades que descrevem a apresentação final administrável (padrão internacional)

Name: CombinedPharmaceuticalDoseForm

Descriptino: Formas farmacêuticas para produtos como um todo, considerando todas as partes individuais, mas antes de qualquer mistura. Diferente de administrable-dose-form, este ValueSet contempla produtos complexos e combinados.
